meanings.definition: A hormone that stimulates the gallbladder to contract and release bile into the small intestine.
meanings.sent1: After eating, cholecystokinin tells the gallbladder to squeeze and send bile.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how cholecystokinin affects digestion in the body.
meanings.sent3: The gallbladder and cholecystokinin had a chat about bile production.
meanings.sent4: Cholecystokinin is like a messenger that commands the gallbladder to work.
meanings.sent5: Imagine cholecystokinin as a tiny conductor directing the gallbladder orchestra.

meanings.definition: A peptide hormone that is released from the duodenum in response to the presence of fats in the small intestine.
meanings.sent1: When fats are detected, cholecystokinin is released from the duodenum.
meanings.sent2: Nutritionists explain how cholecystokinin helps regulate fat digestion.
meanings.sent3: The duodenum threw a party whenever cholecystokinin showed up.
meanings.sent4: Cholecystokinin acts like a gatekeeper, responding to the presence of fats.
meanings.sent5: Picture cholecystokinin as a detective sniffing out fats in the small intestine.
